settings.text:
During our season, we grow a selection of blooms that will make your special day extra special. We can supply curated DIY buckets of flowers and foliage that complement your theme.

Do you feel you need a little help with the flowers? We can also supply bouquets and buttonholes for the wedding party. This is perfect if you don‚Äôt have the time to arrange the showstopper flowers for the ceremony yourself.¬†¬†

Either option will help make your special day sensational and you even more stunüëèningüëè than you already are, you gorgeous thing you.

settings.title: Buckets of blooms
settings.text:
Buckets of blooms come with a glorious selection of flowers and foliage, selected at its peak. Flowers and foliage will come in proportions suitable for making beautiful displays.

We can cut to your general colour theme, but we can't guarantee exact varieties or colours. This is because the flowers change daily through the season. What we can guarantee is that they will be wild and wonderful, and make your heart sing.

Buckets come with around 40-50 stems. Here are a few examples of what you can make with one bucket.

  • 4 jam jar posies or
  • 2 medium vases or
  • 1 centrepiece

settings.title: Bouquets and Buttonholes
settings.text:
Our bouquets and buttonholes service might be just the thing if you need help with flowers for the wedding party.

We don't want to make too many assumptions about who is marrying whom, so we tried to make things simple. We can do three sizes of bouquet and buttonholes. All you need to do is pick how many of each you need.

  • Is it a ‚Äúgowns all around‚Äù kind of day? Why not go for 2 showstoppers? You know you want to
  • Does everyone feel best rocking a suit? Make them extra dapper with buttonholes
  • Bride, groom, and wedding party? One showstopper, 3 supporting bouquets, 3 posies, and 4 buttonholes might be what you‚Äôre after

However you do you, let us know and we'd love to make it work for you.

Nature inspires our relaxed designs. Focal flowers are the stars, but we use texture and scent to make your bouquet a multi-sensory delight. Imagine a sunny wildflower meadow or overflowing cottage garden. That is the feeling we go for in our designs.

We grow without nasty chemicals and encourage wildlife wherever possible. It's really important to us that your flowers are kind on the environment while still making a big impact. That's why we were so chuffed when Country Living Magazine featured us as an eco wedding provider.

As a gay owned and operated business, it's also very important for us to make sure our LGBTQ+ customers are as comfortable as possible. We know that queer folk can have added levels of stress when looking for inclusive suppliers. Know that you are welcome here, whoever you are.

settings.heading: How to get all flowered up

settings.text:
1. Fill in the enquiry form below. If you are not sure exactly what you‚Äôll need, give it your best guess and we can refine later.
  2. Once we have received your enquiry, we‚Äôll get in touch and let you know if we have availability for your dates. If we have availability, we will then go over specifics and write up a proposal for you.
  3. If you are happy to book, we‚Äôll need a booking fee to save the date.
  4. A few weeks before the event, we get in touch to finalise any details like delivery or pickup
  5. Have a glorious ceremony surrounded by gorgeous flowers!

Prices quoted are for 2024. We do not charge VAT. If you are looking for a 2025 booking, we can let you know updated pricing.

settings.heading: Seasonal DIY buckets
settings.description: An overflowing bucket of curated seasonal flowers and foliage. Expect around 40 stems per bucket

settings.heading: Showstopper bouquets
settings.description: For whoever wants the biggest, most luxurious bouquet of the day. Finished with a natural hessian ribbon, or with a colour of your choice. Possibly the bouquet for the bride, but we think anyone can be a showstopper if they want to!

settings.heading: Supporting bouquets
settings.description: Smaller than the showstopper, but still stunning. Perfect for the I Do crew

settings.heading: Posey
settings.description: For any smaller flower people that might be part of the ceremony

settings.heading: Buttonholes
settings.description: For whichever lapels need zhuzhing up
